changelog:
**mwon** StemDock floating dashboard—pin up to 6 HA devices in a smart auto-grid
that flips between portrait and landscape. Tap to toggle, long-press to reorder,
hide by long-pressing empty space. Colors auto-pick from 22 soft tones (lights
always warm yellow), icons map by entity type, names and units sync live from
Home Assistant. Enable via Display ▸ Quick Entity Panel; fill slots in-app or
turn on “HA Slot Configuration” and edit the six text inputs
(ava_quick_entity_slot_1-6) straight from Lovelace—clear all and the panel
vanishes, fill any one and it reappears. Sensors update to two decimals, covers
get position sliders, fans show speed, buttons run scripts instantly. Under the
hood we unified every toggle style, fixed dark-mode background glitches, squashed
muted-device wake-word crashes, tamed nav-bar hide logic on Android ≤11, trimmed
clock FPS to 15 for cooler batteries, plugged memory leaks, recalibrated
screensaver triggers, restored swipe-unlock, ended audio-stream fights, quieted
proximity loops, added Vietnamese translations and let notification previews
play on legacy OS. 21 fixes, one cooler, cleaner, faster wall tablet.
